description: Cork Plate Matt for dining or coffee table.

name: Artist Scarf I
description:
Sophia's 'Artist Scarf I' hints at the popular Ikat pattern and interestingly blends the colours orange and pink. And incidentally, Sophia's favourite colour combination - see her wearing the scarf below. Created to be the scarf that you cannot leave home without, all of Sophia's Artist Scarves are extraordinarily luxurious and lightweight providing great comfort. These large scarves are to be used in the city or as a sarong on the beach, a versatile wardrobe necessity made of natural fibres: 91% modal and 9% silk. Each of Sophia's Artist Scarves are hand dyed in the UK with environmentally safe dyes and each one is finished off with a soft frayed edge. WHOLESALE ONLY - please email sophia@sophiarogge.com for more details.
  • 91% modal & 9% silk
  • environmentally safe dyes
  • 68.8 x 49.6inches/175cm x 126cm
  • hand wash only
  • one size fits all

name: Namena Reef
description:
FINE SILK SCARF: Named after Fiji's most beautiful coral reef, The Namena Reef silk scarf is a breathtaking collection of watercolour paintings of multi-coloured coral blooms. To be worn multiple ways as a scarf, sarong, bandana or an accessory to a bag. WHOLESALE ONLY - please email sophia@sophiarogge.com for more details.
  • 100% silk
  • environmentally safe dyes
  • 49.6 x 49.6 inches / 126 x 126cm
  • hand wash only
  • one size fits all

name: Pink Coral
description:
FINE SILK SCARF: One of the more recognised corals, the Pink Coral has delicate branches and comes in all hues of pink. A stunning source of inspiration for this scarf, look for the long entwined arms of coral painted in the pattern. To be worn multiple ways as a scarf, sarong, bandana or an accessory to a bag. name: Sun Coral
description:
FINE SILK SCARF: The Sun Coral pattern is inspired by one of the ocean's most common and beautiful corals. A soft coral with strong pigmentation, the Sun Coral often stands out amid the rest of the reef's treasures. To be worn multiple ways as a scarf, sarong, bandana or an accessory to a bag. name: Kaleida Beach Bag
description:
Sophia Rogge's range of beach bags are the essence of hippy chic. The whimsical water colour coral paintings on the side are Sophia's signature style. Digitally printed onto organic cotton using environmentally safe dyes, the beautiful imagery will not run or fade. Each of the two tassels on the bag is decorated with a selection of colourful hemp beads, which makes this arm candy really fun! This roomy bag is lined with durable yet soft white canvas to hold your beach towel and magazines. It also has 3 pockets inside to protect your sunglasses, store your wallet and stash your suncreams upright. WHOLESALE ONLY - please email sophia@sophiarogge.com for more details.
  • 100% organic cotton
  • environmentally safe dyes
  • 13.7 x 35.8inches / 35 x 91cm
  • hand wash only
  • one size fits all
  • free postage & packaging within the UK

name: The Summer Dress
description:
Dress designed by luxury womenswear label TEPHI of London and Sand Dollar textile print by Sophia Rogge. Crafted from luxurious silk, this dress celebrates British design and manufacturing. Sophia's Sand Dollar print has been inspired by the sea urchins and sand dollars from the oceans of Fiji. Also known as sea cookies and snapper biscuits, this beautiful petal patterned sea creature continues to grace our tropical landscapes. 10% of profits from this collection will go to Coral for Conservation. WHOLESALE ONLY - please email sophia@sophiarogge.com for more details.
  • Made in England
  • 100% Silk
  • Pastel Blue with a white print
  • Digitally printed
  • free postage & packaging within the UK

name: Kaleida
description:
You will love this fine cotton sarong, which is so soft you'll never want to let it go. Wear it to the beach, lie on it by the pool and wear it as a scarf after a long lazy day in the sun. Accessorize with pretty sandals and lots of bangles, or toughen it up with boots and a banging pair of shades. You may prefer it crisply ironed for each new outing but I suspect that you will fall in love with the folds and creases as your holiday continues...
  • 100% organic cotton
  • glass beading
  • environmentally safe dyes
  • 72 x 44 inches / 182.9 x 112cm
  • hand wash only
  • one size fits all
  • sarong clip not included

name: Corals are Cool
description:
You’ll be wearing this versatile vest top constantly throughout the year... Long enough to wear over your bikini on the beach or, like I've been doing in the city, team it with jeans and a blazer for the day or at night with a killer pair of heels! Accessorize with colour to bring out the vibrancy of the coral paintings. WHOLESALE ONLY - please email sophia@sophiarogge.com for more info.
  • 100% organic cotton
  • environmentally safe dyes
  • machine wash in cold water
  • free postage & packaging within the UK
